items.sentence: Are you suggesting that Tom wasn't telling the truth?
I thought you said that you were coming back to stay.
You know that Tom is still planning to go, don't you?
Just when I was about to do that, it started raining.
He had been a practitioner of Aikido for seven years.
Everybody knows Tom was the one who broke the window.
Everyone here knows that we won't be able to do that.

How can you let your daughter marry someone like Tom?
Tom is showing Mary the new saxophone he just bought.
